title: Hcoin(HCN) Smart Contract
sub_title: Focus on public chain digital exposure storage and valuable digital evidence NFT circulation
description: An Ethereum(ERC20) and multi-chain based public chain contract designed to provide on-chain deposit of valuable digital evidence.
features_intro2: Start Your Public Chain Storage Journey
features_card1_desc: As long as the wallet is ERC20 compatible, you can receive, pay and store evidence.
